name: zylith-circuits
description: Circom circuits for Zylith ZK privacy

scripts.compile: circom membership.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym && circom swap.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym && circom withdraw.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym
scripts.setup: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 14 pot14_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot14_0000.ptau pot14_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot14_0001.ptau pot14_final.ptau -v
scripts.generate-keys: snarkjs groth16 setup membership.r1cs pot14_final.ptau membership_0000.zkey && snarkjs groth16 setup swap.r1cs pot14_final.ptau swap_0000.zkey && snarkjs groth16 setup withdraw.r1cs pot14_final.ptau withdraw_0000.zkey
scripts.export-vk: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey membership_0000.zkey membership_vk.json && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey swap_0000.zkey swap_vk.json && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey withdraw_0000.zkey withdraw_vk.json
scripts.generate-garaga: garaga gen groth16 membership_vk.json --output ../src/privacy/verifier_membership.cairo && garaga gen groth16 swap_vk.json --output ../src/privacy/verifier_swap.cairo && garaga gen groth16 withdraw_vk.json --output ../src/privacy/verifier_withdraw.cairo
